targets.query: select floor(mean(idle)) from cpu_total where  ("host" =~ /^$LINUXHOST$/) and time > now() - 10m

panels.description: disk busy rate. the lower the better

targets.query: select max(busy) from disks where ("host" =~ /^$LINUXHOST$/) and time > now() - 10m

panels.title: disk busy rate(%)

targets.query: select sum(total) as retrans from net_retrans where ("host" =~ /^$LINUXHOST$/) and time > now() - 1h
select last("MemTotal")/1024/1024 as "total", last("Active")/1024/1024 as "active", last("MemFree")/1024/1024 as "free" FROM "proc_meminfo" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$LINUXHOST$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "count" FROM "pkt_staus" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$LINUXHOST$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "status"
